# Solution for Case When Exercise

# Task: Use case/when statements

def get_day_name(day_number)
  case day_number
  when 1
    "Monday"
  when 2
    "Tuesday"
  when 3
    "Wednesday"
  when 4
    "Thursday"
  when 5
    "Friday"
  when 6
    "Saturday"
  when 7
    "Sunday"
  else
    "Invalid day"
  end
end
explanation:
This solution uses case/when statements for multi-branch logic:

1. **case/when**: Alternative to long if/elsif chains

2. **Pattern matching**: Match against specific values

3. **else clause**: Handle unmatched cases
keyPoints: case/when as alternative to long if chains
